#define PLAT_INIT (   ) 
 

Value:

do {                                            \
      WDTCR = (1 << WDCE) | (1 << WDE); /*disable watchdog timer*/      \
      WDTCR = 0x00;                                                     \
      MCUCSR |= (1 << JTD); /*disable on-chip debugging*/               \
   } while(0);
